description: FreshBooks is a cloud-based accounting software service designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering features like invoicing, expense tracking, and time management.

capabilities.name: FRESHBOOKS_LIST_BUSINESSES
capabilities.description: Tool to list all businesses associated with the authenticated user.

capabilities.name: FRESHBOOKS_LIST_PROJECTS
capabilities.description: Tool to list all projects for a business. Use after confirming the business ID.
